data.text: @Avenger1100 Indeed. It wasn’t my question. But the thread was eye opening!

@old_move I did, earlier. Were there any justice left in the world, people would be heading to jail for many years. Of course, those that deserve it won’t see the inside of a jail cell or the end of a rope.
@TeresaBreen15 @Margare73014949 I agree. It wasn’t my question.
@SamLowryEsq @Margare73014949 It was all over the top
@SamLowryEsq I admire your respondents for persisting, but none of them actually addressed the question.
@lockdowns_no @SamLowryEsq For a lot of people it is a major part of their personality now. Like my sister in law who I guess is going to blank me forever now.
@SamLowryEsq Just like the EU bores, a certain element will never stop banging on about it no matter how wrong they were/are.
